Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; exterior: chequer and dot pattern between two thin bands.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 302, no. 1087)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1133) (phase 2)
